attributes.action: Change the driving theory test for dyslexics with memory recall issues.
attributes.additional_details:
"Dyslexia occurs independently of intelligence."
"Dyslexia affects the way information is processed, stored and retrieved, with problems of memory, speed of processing, time perception, organisation and sequencing"
https://www.bdadyslexia.org.uk/dyslexic/dyslexia-and-specific-difficulties-overview
attributes.background:
My son is severely dyslexic and has problems recalling information. 
There are currently no concessions for memory issues, this discriminates against this group of people.

rejection.details:
The content of driving test is the responsibility of the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA). 

You can find out how to contact them here: 

https://www.gov.uk/contact-dvsa
